title: New Year’s Calligraphy
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Ta-daa~, my calligraphy is done, look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>“Deai! Kiai! It’s me, Ai!”....? Come on, don’t do puns on new year’s calligraphy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, Ai has been on a roll since the start of the year~. What did you write, Nico-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Fufufu.... Nico’s glad you asked. Behold, my ambition!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>“World Domination Tour!!”, oooh~, wow! That’s amazing! Ai wants to do it too~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Heh, you can come along if you want.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai wants to make puns with words from all over the world~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Geez, you never change.... But I guess it’ll be powerful if we can capture the audience’s attention with our opening MC....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Right? Laughter brings everyone together~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Change of plans, Ai. Let’s come up with puns for our intros around the world!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
